short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search for information based on record ID or Object Name

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Salesforce Searcher is your go-to assistant for swiftly finding record IDs and object names within Salesforce. Whether you're troubleshooting issues, exploring data structures, or simply need quick access to essential Salesforce information, this extension has you covered. With just a few clicks, you can easily retrieve the details you need, saving you time and effort. Say goodbye to manual searching and hello to streamlined navigation with Salesforce Searcher!
